alert.note: Alert for Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:45PM EDT until June 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR SAGINAW COUNTY... At 645 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Freeland to 7 miles west of Saginaw to 7 miles southwest of Bridgeport, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Freeland around 650 PM EDT. Zilwaukee and Bridgeport around 700 PM EDT. Saginaw around 705 PM EDT. Bay City and Essexville around 715 PM EDT. Kawkawlin around 720 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Brant, Nelson, Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Burt, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Layton Corners and Indiantown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
